com.carnival.sdk

Interface ContentIntentBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContentIntentBuilder

    public ContentIntentBuilder

    Implement this interface to build a custom intent to be executed when the notification is tapped

    Note: Direct to URI notifications using the _u parameter will never call com.carnival.sdk.ContentIntentBuilder$build(android.content.Context,android.os.Bundle)

    Example of usage directing users to SaleActivity when a notification has the custom field `special_price` defined. 

      
   public class SaleContentIntentBuilder implements ContentIntentBuilder {
       @Nullable
       @Override
       public PendingIntent build(Context context, Bundle bundle) {
           if(bundle.containsKey("special_price")) {
               Intent intent = new Intent(context, SaleActivity.class);
               return PendingIntent.getActivity(context, 12345, intent, PendingIntent.FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT);
           }
 
           // return null to keep the default behavior
           return null;
       }
   }
    Add your implementation using com.carnival.sdk.NotificationConfig$setContentIntentBuilder(com.carnival.sdk.ContentIntentBuilder) 
      
       ...
       Carnival.startEngine(getApplicationContext(), "your sdk key");
       NotificationConfig notificationConfig = new NotificationConfig();
       notificationConfig.setContentIntentBuilder(new SaleContentIntentBuilder());
       Carnival.setNotificationConfig(notificationConfig);
       ...

    See Also:
    com.carnival.sdk.ContentIntentBuilder$build(android.content.Context,android.os.Bundle), com.carnival.sdk.NotificationConfig$setContentIntentBuilder(com.carnival.sdk.ContentIntentBuilder)

    • Method Detail

      • build

        @Nullable
android.app.PendingIntent build(android.content.Context context,
                                          android.os.Bundle bundle)

        This method is called to build the intent to be executed when the notification is tapped Please set your own ContentIntentBuilder using com.carnival.sdk.NotificationConfig$setContentIntentBuilder(com.carnival.sdk.ContentIntentBuilder)

        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        bundle - message data as String key/value pairs.
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@f2263e: a PendingIntent to be executed or null to keep the default behaviour from Carnival
        See Also:
        com.carnival.sdk.NotificationConfig$setContentIntentBuilder(com.carnival.sdk.ContentIntentBuilder)
